name: Stolen Gravity
description:
Tips :
- There is no music nor sounds yet, play it listening good folk music, it feels much better.
- The number of players is not limited ! The only limitations are the visibility on the screen, the performance of your computer and your network if you are playing with your smartphone.

Description :Stolen Gravity is a game in wich you explore a weird world using the power of attraction and repulsion. Change your color to be attracted by the planets of the same color and reppelled by the others. Change at the right moment to get where you want ! Don't be affraid to go fast, the pink spaceship will keep you arround.  Protect you spaceship from the monsters of darkness or challenge you friends in the Collect-Race mode.

Warning:
This is a work in progress project, it may still change a lot before the final release.

Important Instructions :
If you want, you can use your smartphone as a controler.  It may not work with Apple hardware. Ensure your phone and your computer are connected to the same wifi network. Launch the game on your computer. Open your web browser on you phone (Google Chrome for example) and enter the URL showed in the game (after selecting multiplayer smartphone in the menu). Wait until it loads, unfortunately, it can take some time so be sure you phone doesn't turn into sleep mode before it's loaded. When loaded, your character should appear in the game and you can play.

Open the menu at any time by pressing the key "M".

The game is not meant to be played alone, it is better with some friends !
